ModuleTitle: Capstone Project for Second Major in Music
Department: Yong Siew Toh Conservatory Of Music
ModuleDescription:
Second Major students in Music will research, design and
develop a music-related project, performance, and/or
thesis, which demonstrates their level of expert capacity in
their concentration.
Prerequisite:
Students must be enrolled in the Second Major, as agreed
with the Conservatory and their home department / faculty,
and have completed a minimum of 16 MCs in their area of
musical concentration.
Preclusion: Restricted to Second Majors in Music students only.
